content: I don't have personal experiences or preferences. however, i can say that guided tours can be worth the extra cost if you want to have a more immersive and educational experience in a new destination. the benefits of a guided tour include access to hidden gems and insider knowledge that you might not discover on your own, the ability to ask questions and interact with a local guide, and the convenience of having transportation and logistics taken care of. of course, if you prefer to explore on your own and want to save money, there are plenty of free and low-cost resources available online for researching self-guided tours and things to do in a destination.
